name: Bear in Venice
description:
Bear in Venice is a very short point-and-click adventure game in the style of the old LucasArts' classics. Honestly, it's more of a tech demo kind of thing I did to learn to use Adventure Game Studio while writing proper longer games.

It's a fun thing nonetheless,  so go ahead and give it a try.  If I find the right inspiration, I might actually expand this into a longer game, or at least do some more adventures of the titular bear character.
